text: (But none is granted it) none is granted the Garden in the Hereafter (save those who are steadfast) in the face of misfortunes and the harm of the enemies in the life of the world, (and none is granted it) and none is given success to repel the evil deed with a good deed (save the owner of great happiness) save the one who has abundant reward in the Garden, like Muhammad (pbuh) and his Companions.
